Name: FiniteSizeScaling3D
Title: Finite-Size Scaling to Estimate Pseudo-Thresholds in 3D Toy Codes
Experiment: Sweep p over a small grid for L in {6,8,10} with modest trials; fit crossing behavior to extract a pseudo-threshold and confidence interval.

Name: BiasAwareHeuristics
Title: Bias-Aware Local Decoders for Asymmetric Noise
Experiment: Introduce a biased noise proxy and test local pairing rules that weight directions differently; compare to unbiased baseline.

Name: SyndromeDenoising3D
Title: Spatial Denoising of 3D Defect Fields Prior to Decoding
Experiment: Apply simple 3D filters (e.g., 3×3×3 majority) before decoding and measure impact on LER vs p under tight compute budgets.

Name: SliceVs3DDecoding
Title: Layered Slice-Wise Pairing vs. Single-Pass 3D Clustering
Experiment: Implement a slice-wise pairing heuristic and compare against simple 3D clustering on runtime and LER.

Name: UncertaintyEstimates
Title: Variance-Aware LER Curves with Trial-Based Standard Errors
Experiment: Track and plot standard errors for LER across trials; evaluate how many trials are needed for stable estimates at each p.
